title: I was having bad lag last game and I went through a wall
body: Now everyone was calling me a hacker, can I get banned for this? I have no idea how i went through a wall

replies.body:
If you weren't actually hacking, there's nothing to worry about. The systems don't blindly report someone because of reports in one game without any sort of investigation or double-checking.

Let me know if you have any questions or if you experience any other issues with packet loss or connection issues.

> Let me know if you have any questions or if you experience any other issues with packet loss or connection issues.

I think its packet loss, I sit very far away from my modem (on the other side of the house, over the kitchen which also has a laptop.) I use a wireless connection.

Gotcha. As a preventative step, I recommend optimizing your network settings by following our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). These steps will ensure your DNS, ports and firewalls are all set to their best configurations for League to run smoothly.

Let me know if you experience any other connection issues after taking those steps.
Glitches happen in any game no matter how rigorously it's tested. Do you remember which wall you went through/what was going on when it happened?
